item.title: How to compile your C++ code in Visual Studio Code
item.description: C++ is a statically-typed, free-form, (usually) compiled, multi-paradigm, intermediate-level general-purpose middle-level programming language.‚Äù In simple terms, C++ is a sophisticated, efficient and a general-purpose programming language based on C. It was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup in 1979. One of C++’s main feature is the compiler. This is used to compile and run C++ code. A compiler is a special program that processes statements written in a particular programming language like C++ and turns them into machine language or “code” that a computer’s processor uses.
